resources.string: Select the maximum number of words for your anagrams:
Select the minimum number of characters for each word:
Welcome to Anagen.\nYour sweet way of playing with words.

You first enter a phrase to find the anagrams for.

Then you select the Maximum number of words you'd expect to have in your anagram, and the minimum number of characters for each word.
This is done by choosing any of the options from the two drop down lists.

Tap "Show Anagrams" and there you go, you got your result.
